text: Le Pont-de-Planches is a former commune in the Haute-Saône department in the region Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in eastern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of La Romaine.Arrêté préfectoral 24 July 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Haute-Saône
title: Le Pont-de-Planches
